name: places/ChIJYfAKFoxYwokRonOpKCQv7kk
formattedAddress: 675 West 59th Street (Waterline Square, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 675 West 59th Street (Waterline Square, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text: There is not enough words to explain how much Danielle has helped me during years I have been client. She has gone up and beyond to be there for me during my wellness and life challenges. I had been to MANY fitness coaches, dietitians and personal trainers during the years for the different challenges I had. I found Danielle’s website in 2016, when I looked for a new nutritionist in NYC and loved how Danielle had overcome her own challenges and felt it herself, and then helping others. Food and wellness is in general difficulty and there have been many times I wanted to give up my journey, but Danielle was there for me with new hope, new advice and never judged me. I still have sessions with Danielle about once a month, although I currently live in Norway she is still a very important part of my life. This may seem like I’m just giving a review and just saying many good things etc. But Danielle is still there for me, although I have had many setbacks in my life during these 7 years and have not met my goals yet, she helps me readjust and she has given me more faith in my self, so my challenges are not as bad as they used to be with her help and guidance. This review is way overdue and since I started seeing Danielle I have not needed help from others regarding nutrition and wellness. I am so grateful to have her and will continue on as long as possible:)

originalText.text:
There is no greater investment then taking the time and money to invest in yourself.  If you are serious about becoming fit, healthy, and looking your best, you must contact Danielle!!
Danielle is one of the most knowledgeable and personable professionals that I know. She is so passionate about health and nutrition  and  goes above and beyond to make herself accessible and to make certain that every one of her clients gets the personal attention, follow up and inspiration that they need to achieve their goals. I recommend her to all of my patients and friends and know that they will receive unsurpassed expertise from someone who is more than just a nutritionist, but a mentor and friend.

originalText.text: Danielle is the BEST nutritionist that I know.  She is professional, smart, and extremely knowledgeable.  She is 100 percent client focused, and she is so incredibly passionate about her clients and her job.  There is no other nutritionist that I trust more than Danielle.  She works hard to achieve the goals that she sets for her clients.  I highly recommend Danielle if you are looking for a TOP nutritionist.

originalText.text: Danielle has more knowledge in Nutrition and weight loss than any nutritionist I have ever met with. She has taught me how foods I thought was “diet safe” are actually loaded with calories and helped me create a diet with foods that I like, in portions that make sense! Thank you Danielle.

originalText.text: Danielle Pashko is not only a beautiful, talented professional, she understands the struggle of weight loss.  She has an uncanny intuition about the problem at hand and I trust her advice and guidance.  I highly recommend her.
